title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, June 24, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1374 in Aachen, Germany that an outbreak of dancing plague or dancing mania, also known as St. Vitus’ Dance, first began.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1374 in Aachen, Germany that an outbreak of dancing plague or dancing mania, also known as St. Vitus’ Dance, first began.
